holidays.title: International Literacy Day
holidays.description: "To remind the public of the importance of literacy as dignity and human rights.”

holidays.title: Actors' Day
holidays.description: On this day, we celebrate the actors and actresses who make stories come alive.

holidays.title: Are You Okay Day
holidays.description: Are You Okay Day is observed to make us and those around us seen, heard, and understood.

holidays.title: National Ampersand Day
holidays.description: Oh, yes, ampersand! Get your pens ready as we explore this curly and quirky little character.

holidays.title: National David Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the lives of Davids all over the world as we mark National David Day.

holidays.title: National Dog Walker Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let us appreciate the incredible people who help and celebrate our furry friends every day!

holidays.title: National Iguana Awareness Day
holidays.description: It’s the day to learn about taking good care of iguanas.

holidays.title: National Pediatric Hematology/Oncology Nurses Day
holidays.description: Honor and laud the efforts of our nurses as they help young patients and their families.

holidays.title: National School Pictures Day
holidays.description: School picture day is one that kids eagerly look forward to, and with good reason!

holidays.title: Native Women's Equal Pay Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn more about Native Women’s Equal Pay Day and how to raise awareness.

holidays.title: Our Lady of Meritxell Day
holidays.description: Get ready to honor the heritage of the most hallowed Andorran holiday.

holidays.title: Pardon Day
holidays.description: Human relationships can become sour, but also give us a chance to find peace and happiness.

holidays.title: Star Trek Day
holidays.description: Live long and prosper, and binge on one of the world’s best media franchises.

holidays.title: World Literacy Day
holidays.description: Be a part of the movement as millions across the globe advocate for literacy!

holidays.title: World Physical Therapy Day
holidays.description: World Physical Therapy Day is observed every year on September 8. It is celebrated to raise awareness about the critical role of physical therapists and…

holidays.title: Avicii’s Birthday
holidays.description: This musician can rest knowing the world is better off having experienced his talents.

holidays.title: Jonah Michael Scott’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this exceptional American voice actor, the sky is indeed the limit.

holidays.title: Moe Assad’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this professional Twitch streamer, irrevocable success is one live stream away.

holidays.title: Ruby Bridges’s Birthday
holidays.description: This civil rights activist walked a challenging path so that present and future generations could fly.

holidays.title: Wiz Khalifa’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented musician has created a timeless legacy in the music industry.
